/usr/bin/c++    -DCPP11_INITIALIZER_LIST -std=c++0x -DCPP11_AUTO -std=c++0x -std=c++0x    CMakeFiles/display3DToOFF.dir/display3DToOFF.cpp.o  -o display3DToOFF -rdynamic -L/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/build ../../src/libDGtal.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_program_options-mt -Wl,-Bdynamic -Wl,-rpath,/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/build:/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/build/src
